SELECT SI_SHOBYO.SI_SHOBYO_ID ,
SI_SHOBYO.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_SHOBYO.HOKEN_NO , SI_SHOBYO.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SI_SHOBYO.KIND, SI_SHOBYO.MS_VESSEL_ID, SI_SHOBYO.STATUS, SI_SHOBYO.SHOBYO_NAME, SI_SHOBYO.FROM_DATE, SI_SHOBYO.TO_DATE, SI_SHOBYO.TOKYU, SI_SHOBYO.NITIGAKU, SI_SHOBYO.KINGAKU, SI_SHOBYO.KOUZA,
SI_SHOBYO.SEND_DOCUMENT, SI_SHOBYO.DOCUMENT_RETURN, SI_SHOBYO.FILING_DATE, SI_SHOBYO.NOTIFICATION, SI_SHOBYO.ADVANCE_VOUCHER, SI_SHOBYO.DEPOSIT_SLIP, SI_SHOBYO.MONEY_TRANSFER, SI_SHOBYO.MAIL_TO_PRINCIPAL,
SI_SHOBYO.DELETE_FLAG , SI_SHOBYO.SEND_FLAG , SI_SHOBYO.VESSEL_ID , SI_SHOBYO.DATA_NO , SI_SHOBYO.USER_KEY , SI_SHOBYO.RENEW_DATE , SI_SHOBYO.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_SHOBYO.TS
FROM SI_SHOBYO
#APPEND_JOIN_STR#
WHERE SI_SHOBYO.DELETE_FLAG = 0
INNER JOIN MS_SENIN ON MS_SENIN.MS_SENIN_ID = SI_SHOBYO.MS_SENIN_ID AND MS_SENIN.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID

INSERT INTO SI_SHOBYO( SI_SHOBYO_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ID , HOKEN_NO , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , KIND, MS_VESSEL_ID, STATUS, SHOBYO_NAME, FROM_DATE, TO_DATE, TOKYU, NITIGAKU, KINGAKU, KOUZA,
SEND_DOCUMENT, DOCUMENT_RETURN, FILING_DATE, NOTIFICATION, ADVANCE_VOUCHER, DEPOSIT_SLIP, MONEY_TRANSFER, MAIL_TO_PRINCIPAL,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_SHOBYO_ID ,
:MS_SENIN_ID , :HOKEN_NO , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :KIND, :MS_VESSEL_ID, :STATUS, :SHOBYO_NAME, :FROM_DATE, :TO_DATE, :TOKYU, :NITIGAKU, :KINGAKU, :KOUZA,
:SEND_DOCUMENT, :DOCUMENT_RETURN, :FILING_DATE, :NOTIFICATION, :ADVANCE_VOUCHER, :DEPOSIT_SLIP, :MONEY_TRANSFER, :MAIL_TO_PRINCIPAL,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_SHOBYO SET MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID , HOKEN_NO = :HOKEN_NO , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID ,
KIND = :KIND, MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID, STATUS = :STATUS, SHOBYO_NAME = :SHOBYO_NAME, FROM_DATE = :FROM_DATE, TO_DATE = :TO_DATE, TOKYU = :TOKYU, NITIGAKU = :NITIGAKU, KINGAKU = :KINGAKU, KOUZA = :KOUZA,
SEND_DOCUMENT = :SEND_DOCUMENT, DOCUMENT_RETURN = :DOCUMENT_RETURN, FILING_DATE = :FILING_DATE, NOTIFICATION = :NOTIFICATION, ADVANCE_VOUCHER = :ADVANCE_VOUCHER, DEPOSIT_SLIP = :DEPOSIT_SLIP, MONEY_TRANSFER = :MONEY_TRANSFER, MAIL_TO_PRINCIPAL = :MAIL_TO_PRINCIPAL,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_SHOBYO_ID = :SI_SHOBYO_ID AND TS = :TS
